content.label: Great game but it never really gets challengingüòï
Hard to stop even when you are stuck you jeep coming back to make it work!
This game is great. What a gentle, soothing experience it is to relax to these puzzles that gently ramp up the difficulty.
It‚Äôs fun in the beginning nevertheless.

The visuals and the music are designed very well. This game is nice and relaxing, and decently challenging. I love how music is integrated into the mechanics of the game. The only thing I don‚Äôt like is how each levels music doesn‚Äôt ever really feel finished. That‚Äôs my only gripe, I didn‚Äôt take off a star for that though cause that might just be a personal taste thing. Again, beautiful game! Will recommend it! Great job, developers!
Would like some more variation in background/environments but it‚Äôs a joy to play and tricky enough to make you think but not soo tricky it‚Äôs frustrating.
I enjoy the gameplay, but I beat this game in just a couple of days. I would have liked something more challenging. Glad I didn‚Äôt pay full price.
Found it through a gaming advisor at AppUnwrapper. Gets you thinking
Soothing. Puzzly. Cute. Groovy.

Graphics, sound, atmosphere, everything is great. The puzzle design is amazing, makes you think outside the box. You need to experience it for yourself, definitely worth the money!! There need to be more games like this.

title.label: Could have been great. But alas, no.

content.label: The "music" is the same on each level. Only 84 levels that I finished in 3 days for $3 üôÑ. If you like puzzle games, try Botanicula. You'll enjoy the graphics and sound effects. It would be a relaxing game if you could use the level interludes as a meditation background. But there's no way to return to them after you've advanced to the next level. Would have also been nice to design your own level to create your own melody once you finished all the levels. Another missing feature. On to the next one üë£üë£
I want to give it 4.5 but I‚Äôll up it to 5 because 4 leaves room for assumptions that this game isn‚Äôt perfect. So pleasing.  Simple design. Catchy beats.  Enjoyable to play. Well done.

I like that you can alter the variables in real time and see the effects. The sound is cool too. 
UPDATE: Beat this game in 4 days. Only 100 levels. Good game but SHORT! Especially for $3. Think twice.
Update 2: Still nothing new. There is more playability in Candy Crush.
Incredibly rudimentary ‚Äúpuzzles‚Äù. Repetitive levels. Good for young children. Nothing more.
Fun game, good way to pass time. Levels are sometimes hard but often predictable, still it‚Äôs a nice puzzle game that is not so hard that is gets frustrating.
I liked this game quite a bit. However, 85 levels is not enough! I hope the developers come up with more in the near future :)

Just challenging enough for this 67 yr old. Some puzzles you‚Äôll get rapidly while others took me a few hours of repeated efforts. A really complicated one may be followed by one less so, but you‚Äôre slowly building your skills and you won‚Äôt get overly discouraged. Just when it gets easy they throw in another twist to complicate things and further challenge you. Easily one of the most enjoyable ways to escape the monkey mind or pass time while waiting. Addictive! A real bargain for a very fair price. I‚Äôm told there are 80 levels. I‚Äôm at level 43 after several days. I‚Äôll be sad when it‚Äôs over.
The puzzle type is not original, but how animation, sound and design was incorporated is fantastic. A joy to play, listen to and look at. Thank you for a great addition to the puzzle genre.

I‚Äôm enjoying knocking these out a few levels at a time. It‚Äôs odd that not all the ostensibly noise-emitting elements (bounces) actually emit sound. So, there‚Äôs a rhythm that reflects the puzzle configuration, but it‚Äôs ‚Äúedited‚Äù.
I can‚Äôt figure out how to slide the sliders, they only go to either end, and so can‚Äôt beat level 30... what am I doing wrong? iPhone player.

title.label: Nice game, though not challenging enough

content.label: It‚Äôs a beautiful game, with lovely music and graphics. The pricing is reasonable. The only drawback is that it is not challenging enough, so I finished the whole game pretty quickly. It would be a good game for kids though.
I loved this game. I didn‚Äôt love how easy it was to beat, and the price tag associated with that ease. Other than that, great game.

The description says it is a musical puzzle but this is not the case. You can actually play this game without listening to the audio. A musical puzzle would be something a lot more interesting and unique that a visual game with a dynamic audio sound track.

To the creators: I applaud you for the wonderful effort you put into this app. Not only is it fluid, but captivating and most of all entertaining. I enjoy this game a lot and not only does it help with my anxiety but it‚Äôs calming, fun, puzzling, and most of all beautiful. Great job.

To the customers: Though the price may look /intimidating/, I believe this game is worth it. It‚Äôs fun. It‚Äôs rythmic. From my experience, it‚Äôs not buggy. I‚Äôm already at level 50 after 3 days. It‚Äôs calming, entertaining, and absolutely beautiful. If you can‚Äôt sleep, if you‚Äôre bored. If you need a distraction from a bustling, stressful life, I recommend giving this game a shot.

I like it!

Still not through all the levels yet, and so far nothing‚Äôs taken me too long to solve, but I‚Äôm fine with that.

The rhythm/music part doesn‚Äôt sound bad at all, and overall, Eloh is just a relaxing puzzle game to pick up and put down. WYSIWYG.
The music, graphics, and gameplay is beautifully done!
Enough mental gymnastics to keep you engaged and exceptional sound design to be relaxing throughout. My kids love it, and when their turn is up, it‚Äôs hard for me to put it down.

title.label: ye S...u will smi Le 4 shur

content.label: There are fun puzzle games and there are frustrating puzzle games....this one is doable from the get go....u need to think but u smile while ur doing it....it makes u happy and u want to keep playing and playing....those kind of games don‚Äôt come along very often....impressed from the start.....Great game.....

At heart, ELOH is a puzzling iOS beauty that adds a rhythmic twist. ELOH caught my eye when I noticed that this iOS app held a rhythmic aspect as well. I immediately purchased ELOH after reading that the developers created this iOS app as a puzzling/rhythmic game. As I began to play ELOH, I immediately fell in love with this amazing iOS app!!

I am around 35 levels in and loving this attractive and chill puzzle game.  It seems like a perfect fit for my type of gaming on my iPad.  When a level is challenging, the easy trial and error gameplay removes any chance of frustration.  The game continues to gradually introduce new types of movement and complexity.  The sound and graphics are really lovely.  I would write more, but I need to get back to ELOH!

title.label: They had me at ‚Äúno timers or IAPs‚Äù

content.label: It‚Äôs relaxing, it‚Äôs challenging, and it‚Äôs beautiful, both visually and aurally. As i noted in the title of my review, the wise developers didn‚Äôt choose to ruin a relaxing game by forcing you to rush through each level. Take your time. Listen to the rhythms, don‚Äôt worry about the balls flying offscreen as you ponder your strategy, and watch the super crisp and charming animation. Best $3 I‚Äôve spent in weeks.
